TickIt: AI Grocery List Maker

Make grocery shopping easy. Easily create & store lists for each major supermarket and sort them based on the typical layout of each.

Download on the App Store See features Privacy policy

TickIt AI is your smart companion for grocery shopping. Quickly create lists for your favourite supermarket and let AI sort it for you based on the layout. Organize your shopping by categories, share lists with family, and tick off items as you go. Perfect for busy individuals, families, and anyone who wants to save time at the store - never double back for items again!

Why you’ll love it

AI-powered sorting

Sort items in your list based on the layout of the respective supermarket

Easy list creation

Add items by typing or bulk upload for fast and flexible list building.

Tick items off

Tick off items as you move around the shop so you have confidence nothing is left behind.

Share & collaborate

Share lists with family or roommates so you're all on the same page!

All major supermarkets

Support for all the biggest supermarkets globally.

Privacy-first

Your lists and data stay private. Simple controls and a clear privacy policy for peace of mind.

How it works

  1. Create: Start a new grocery list by choosing the supermarket and adding items.
  2. Organize: Let TickIt AI categorize and sort your items for efficient shopping.
  3. Collaborate: Share your list and sync updates with others in real time.
  4. Shop: Check off items as you shop to ensure nothing is missed.

Screenshots

Get Tickit AI

FAQ

Does Tickit AI work offline?

You can create and manage lists offline. Some features, like AI sorting and syncing, require an internet connection.

Can I share my lists?

Yes! Share and collaborate on lists with family or friends.

Which devices are supported?

Tickit AI works on iPhone and iPad with recent iOS/iPadOS versions. See the App Store for details.

How is my data handled?

Your privacy is important. Read the Privacy Policy for full details.

Is Tickit AI free?

TickIt AI is free for all to use!

Support

Questions or feedback? Email cloud.point88@gmail.com.
